title: Keep getting disconnected constantly
body: Ever since yesterday League has been unplayable for me. It first happened in a ranked game but only happened once. The next game, it happened a few time. Now the last couple games I've played have been hell. I get DC'd and wait for a few seconds. After a few second, I am connected back and I walk to my lane. As soon as I reach my lane and even sometimes before I leave the fountain, I can't move. The Attempting To Reconnect is sitting there.

replies.body: It sounds like your connection to our game server has been continuously degrading to the point of getting kicked off entirely.  You should run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

That sucks to hear, but thanks for following up with me.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will work with you individually to see what's up.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well, and attach it to your ticket for better  context.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
